website_summaries.verdict: You can rely on this rugged cast iron pump with a 6-foot lift for diesel fuel.
pros: Available for leaded, unleaded, and diesel in manual or auto
Pump can run with nozzle closed, between tanks
cons: Pump hose may not be that durable, and will need to be replaced at some point

customer_reviews.title: The little pump that could
customer_reviews.text: Just got this little pump and so far only have one complaint. I have this mounted on a 45 gallon aluminum tank in my truck and this rascal is loud. Granted, it's on a smaller aluminum tank so that's part of the problem, but my Dad has a GPI (silver pump) on a larger steel tank and it's so quiet you can barely hear it over his truck rumbling. I can't say that's a fair comparison since one is a large steel tank and one is small aluminum but I do believe GPI is a quieter pump. Other than that, this pump runs like a top and does the job I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Pump
customer_reviews.text: Good pump. pumps well. I pumped 500 gals thru over 100' of hose and pipe with numerous elbows and was still getting 4-6 GPM. I imagine with a short hose and filter you might get close to 10GPM. If you want more flow than that the 20GPM model is only $80 more. Use this one in my truck now for the transfer tank. and ordered a 1/2 hp 25GPM for the 100' system ..... but then I paid $600 for that pump. Pretty descent for a $240 pump. With all the pumps expect them to flow a little slower than the maximum rated capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been using for approx 6 months now and works great and plenty of refilling power almost too much
customer_reviews.text: Been using for approx 6 months now and works great and plenty of refilling power almost too much. I use this on a tractor and a diesel truck on some rural property and filled both tanks quickly. Does not have an auto cut off so as you get near the top slow down rate of fill to keep from splash back which is common on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other brand right beside it!
customer_reviews.text: Best of the best. I can certainly feel and see the quality of this fill-rite pump. It out performs the other unit dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: HeZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pump and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pump and easy installation. I use it to transfer fuel to my PU when pulling my trailer so I probably didn't need the 15 GPM that this pump delivers. I would also recommend buying a particulate filter to be sure of fuel quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Oepkes

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if the hose was a little stiffer
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a fueling station on a travel trailer project. Works very well, and these are a lot more reliable than the cheesy fueling stations that come with most toy boxes. It pumps fuel really fast, so you have to be careful with the smaller quads. It would be nice if the hose was a little stiffer, and more kink resistant like the hoses you see at gas stations. It is a little noisy though.
customer_reviews.author: JW_Redlands

customer_reviews.title: Fuel Pump Keeps track of how much it pumps and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This pump went together easily and pumps diesel quickly. The nozzel may have trouble staying in the holster, but I found after padlocking it it stayed right in place. The only thing is it is a little noisy when pumping, but so are a lot of gas station pumps so no complaints. Plus it only is on for a few minutes max to fill my F-350 fuel tank from the transfer tank in the bed. I added a Goldenrod water filter at the recommendation of the Better Built tank manufacturer and it works equally well with this pump.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Had a hole in it and sprayed fuel all over the place
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the pump as instructed but when I went to test it fuel started spraying all over my barn. There was a hole in the back of the pipe that connects the pump to the meter. I called fill rite and they said they'd overnight me a new meter. It took almost a week to receive the "overnight" package which didn't have the proper replacement part. I'm returning the pump and going with another brand.,
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Problem with new pump out of box.
customer_reviews.text: After installing the pump in my diesel transfer tank I hooked it up to a power source and it ran for about 15 seconds before it blew a 15amp fuse. I installed a new 15 amp fuse and tried it again and it ran for about 35 seconds also it pumped fuel both times . So I installed a20 amp fuse and it is working ok so far. I checked all electrical connections to make sure they were all tight and not grounded any place.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: More expensive but very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Fitted together very well and works with the filter unit and fuel filling caddy very well. Previous pump didnt like ethanol containing gasolines and quit working but this one seems to be resistant to the ethanol and does not yet damage the seals and internals. This one is more costly but it is far more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Not so Excellent Paint
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Installation is straight forward if you are mechanically inclined. The instructions were written for someone with mechanical and electrical experience and may be difficult to understand for someone who is not experienced. Does not come with a multi-plane swivel like you would find on a gas pump so you will have to buy on separately if you want one. The only thing I'm not thrilled with is the paint job. It is not well adhered to the metal and will chip off if the pump hits or is hit buy something, this includes the wrenches you use to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stensberg

customer_reviews.title: I just bought FR1210GA and installed in into my standing ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought FR1210GA and installed in into my standing tank. The nozzle leaks fuel when you turn off the pump and store it. The nozzle does not allow the pressure to bled off and drain the hose.
customer_reviews.author: jconleyj

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice pump Very well made & easy installation. I routed the power to my upfitter switch # 1 in the cab - the harness that came with it was plenty long enough!
customer_reviews.author: Weinnand S.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Only after a couple months of use this has been leaking through a hole above the bypass valve. After researching it I found the reason for the leak is due to a bad seal in the pump and was told by manufacturer to send it back. Presently I am having issues getting warranty support even though this was purchased 5 months ago and it has a 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Typical Fill-Rite quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rugged construction. Good performance. I did have to replace the supply pipe with one I fabricated, as new low profile tank was too shallow for the provided tube.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Has leaked since it was installed. Company replaced nozzle but it still leaked afterwards. I’ve had to retighten most of the bolts. Don’t waste your money. UPDATED. Finally done with the leaking, called the company again over a year after purchasing and they are replacing the unit, so the customer service is good.
customer_reviews.author: jake dunning

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 times of use
customer_reviews.text: Pump works fine three times the third time it stopped working will update the review Once I understand why
customer_reviews.author: the buudha

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - and this little beauty isn't cheap - but it's a solid performer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal - not cheap, but works as well or better than expected! I installed on a stand-pipe, outside of my tank, so didn't need the Telescoping Suction Pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Al Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: A quality product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pump to replace an older pump. This pump was easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. Finish already coming off after 8 months....
customer_reviews.text: It's REALLY loud for what it is. Besides that, it works just fine. The finish is already coming off in places, only been 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Will Hoban

customer_reviews.title: Works very well to keep truck full and my tractor full of fuel.
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to change and reused the suction on old pump that was in my diesel tank.
customer_reviews.author: John Edward Sink

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: have only used it a few times, but it seems to be well built.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Quit after about 2 years but pumped a lot of fuel.
customer_reviews.text: Quit after about 2 years but in its defense pumped a lot fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Quick and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for many years now. This new one is very efficient and the flow rate is perfect. It fills up our excavators quickly and effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Drone Site Pros™

customer_reviews.title: Great little pump
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for farm use , will have to cut suction tube for installation in a transfer tank
customer_reviews.author: Melinda2013

customer_reviews.title: It's fast with no spills.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect when refuel our race boat at a pit stop.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It works as it should
customer_reviews.text: The pump is compact and works as it should. In fact, it has more suction than I thought it would have and drew the water from the bottom of an in ground oil tank that is at least 8ft to the bottom. At the price, it is about the same as having someone come out to do that, twice. Well worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Leeper

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fuel pump been running them for years never have had a problem
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pumps, and neither works after I installed them
customer_reviews.author: L. Woods

customer_reviews.title: company refuses to communicate when there's a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install but the pump stopped working after about 2 weeks of installation and only pumped about 40 gallons. Company refuses to turn phone calls it has been over a week since the initial phone call they are not doing anything to try to replace this item.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER GODWIN

customer_reviews.title: Pump does not work
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to hooking up the pump and it doesn’t work at all. Terrible quality.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pump.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, works great so far. I’ve had it 3 months or so.

customer_reviews.title: Great pump!
customer_reviews.text: Fill Rite makes the best pumps. I've bought many of these over the years and they always perform perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Good pump for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pump works as it should ...it is very loud. I have several other pumps like this one that do not make as much noise. I think it doesn’t quite pump at the capacity advertised but is close.

customer_reviews.title: A good pump!
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it is supposed to do, fair price, and locks up secure. We have had ours for 4 months without a problem. Off road diesel is all we have used it for.

customer_reviews.title: Not Working out of box
customer_reviews.text: Received this unit a month ago. Finally installed and found out it works for 8 seconds and shuts off. After awhile it will run again for another 8 seconds and shuts off. I see I missed my return date by 10 days. So now now what do I do with a $300 purchase that is not working? Help me here Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this pump
customer_reviews.text: I had this tank and pump professionally installed by a certified mechanic. The pump failed after pumping two gal though it. This should not fail after using it just once. I'm not recommending it at all and it was a extremely expensive failure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PTO failed after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Installed September 2018, January 2019 started blowing fuses, wiring checked and rechecked. Research indicates that there is a PTO kit that might fix the problem for between $20 to $40 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Bechtel

customer_reviews.title: Pick up tube to long for 37gal tank
customer_reviews.text: Overall great pump! Only issue so far is the pickup tube that comes with it is to long for the 37gal tank. Had to alter it to fit. When I ordered it said is discription it would fit. It was 2” to long.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Durbin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, have only had it less than a month ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, have only had it less than a month but so far works exactly as advertised and was easy to install. While I have not measured its transfer rate it fills up the tanks I use it for in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C Rosian

customer_reviews.title: This pump is not a good pump
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump in July and it already stop working in only a month

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, bought this to replace an existing pump that had been on my truck for 11 Years

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought April 20, 2018, used it twice and now 4 months later it will not work

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pump. Not as fast as the 20gpm I had but the cost saving makes up for it.

customer_reviews.title: Great pump but the hose kinks
customer_reviews.text: The hose kinks at the pump easily and it does draw quite a bit of power (around 20-25 amps). Other than that it’s a great pump for transferring from 55gallon drums

customer_reviews.title: Product wasn't what i expected.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last long, had to buy a new one after 2 years.

customer_reviews.title: Great pump

customer_reviews.title: Fuel pump for truck mounted 100 gallon tank.
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to tell but seems very fast and handy the way it's constructed. Terrific buy for the money. A lot of different parts to assemble but went together good. Shipping time was on the dot.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!! Saved me a trip to retailer, easy to install and came as described.

customer_reviews.title: Medium/easy install
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are very easy to follow but you have to have some assembly experience along with wiring knowledge. This pump will pull most of the fuel out of your auxiliary tank. It is a bit noisy when it's operating and doesn't have an auto stop so that it stops pumping fuel when the tank being filled is full. With the loud noise of the pump, it makes it difficult to hear when the tank being filled is getting full.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: As described and made it before the items that were ...
customer_reviews.text: As described and made it before the items that were to arrive sooner. Did have some minor damage to the suction tube due to OEM packaging. Well made product and made in USA.

customer_reviews.text: This pump is great! We have three trucks with transfer tanks and this pump works great!

customer_reviews.title: A very well made item.
customer_reviews.text: When I needed a gas pump, I first ordered a Chinese clone. It didn't have the strength (and ability) to lift the fuel 3 feet out of the tank. I should have ordered the Fill-Rite pump to start with. It works perfectly. It is strong, reliable and really made well. I learned my lesson: If you want something to be made well, and be reliable, purchase it from a U.S. company - who will also support the product if you do have any difficulties. This pump is perfect. Now, I can pump fuel reliably!
customer_reviews.author: KentR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the pump and has had no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Transfer pump!  Highly Reccomended.
customer_reviews.text: I previously used a 14 gallon gravity feed tank and it was very slow. I upgraded to a 30 gallon tank and needed something to fill up faster. This is really great to use, its very fast, quiet and easy. Putting it together took a little bit of effort, and you do need to provide your own battery clips/terminal connectors. If basic electrical wiring scares you, then get someone to help, otherwise, this install is very easy. The power cord and fill hose is long enough for most any job.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pump
customer_reviews.text: The pump was delivered on time with no damage. The kit comes with everything you need to install. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Finally got it installed and it worked great for 2 months and then just stopped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last November and it sat in a box until this July. Finally got it installed and it worked great for 2 months and then just stopped. It's still getting power and the switch works but the pump itself never even twitches. Really disappointed. It has a 2 year warranty but the "return your order" button isn't available. Not sure what to do with this $300+ paperweight

customer_reviews.title: Great product made here in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Great product made here in the USA. Works flawlessly. Packaged very well and instructions were very clear. Minimal assembly required. Only complaint is it leaks continuously after used. I have diesel all over the side of my truck. Would be 5 stars if not for this. I did find the suction pipe was too short for the tank I ordered. Not Fill-Rite's fault, and a simple modification fixed the problem. Not something that affects my rating, but worth noting since I think my tank is a standard depth tank for a pickup truck.

product_meta.title: Fill-Rite FR1210H 12V 15 GPM Fuel Transfer Pump (Manual Nozzle, Discharge Hose, Suction Pipe)
product_meta.description: Style:12V 15 GPM w/Manual NozzleThe FR1210H is a 12V 15 GPM fuel transfer pump that comes with a ¾” x 12’ discharge hose, ¾” manual nozzle, 1” x 34” telescoping steel suction pipe, 3/4" elbow, 5’ 12-gauge ground wire, and a 18’ 12 gauge 2-wire battery cable. It can be used to pump gasoline, diesel, kerosene, ethanol blends up to 15%, methanol blends up to 15%, and bio-diesel up to B20. The previous FR1210G model has been updated to the FR1210H model. With a removable junction box, the product is now easier to install. The performance specifications of the product did not change.
feature_bullets: Durable cast iron pump housing built to withstand the wear and tear of rough operating environments
Removable junction box allows for easier installation
Thermal overload protection prevents motor from overheating during abnormal usage
Pump is capable of pumping fluid out of an 8' deep storage tank (at sea level)
Rugged switch lever is designed to endure heavy abuse

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
